Description: Ability to browse the product catalog and view details.
Rights to complete the checkout process and make a purchase
Permission to view the status of an existing order.
Ability to edit personal information, payment methods, and shipping addresses
Ability to add, update, and remove products from the catalog.
Permission to issue refunds for orders
Ability to access and generate reports on sales performance.
Rights to view, suspend, or reactivate user accounts.
View a customer's information, but only for accounts assigned to the account manager.
Add a new potential customer to the system.
Create and launch marketing campaigns within the application
Read and update customer support tickets.
Permission for an auditor to view a list of payments, but not to submit or approve them.
Rights for a finance VP to approve high-value transactions.
